sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-dashboard', templateUrl: './admin-dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-dashboard.component.css'] }) export class AdminDashboardComponent { } Admin Dashboard



Welcome to Admin Dashboard

The Admin Dashboard is the control center for managing users, subjects, and attendance. You can add new users in the Add User section, view all users in All Users, and modify user details under Edit User. For educational content, subjects can be added via Add Subject, managed in All Subjects, and edited in Edit Subject. Lastly, the View All Attendance section provides an overview of attendance records across the platform.
